content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  November 13 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned BankUnited  Inc's  (BankUnited; 'BBB'/Outlook Stable) senior 4.875% fixed-rate notes due 2025 a  senior unsecured rating of 'BBB'. The notes were issued under BankUnited's shelf  registration filed on Oct. 26  2015.
